roughcut.media.videoeditor

Class OverlayFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • roughcut.media.videoeditor.Overlay
      • roughcut.media.videoeditor.OverlayFrame

  • public class OverlayFrame
extends Overlay
    This class is used to overlay an image on top of a media item.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class roughcut.media.videoeditor.Overlay

    • Constructor Detail

      • OverlayFrame

        public OverlayFrame(MediaItem mediaItem,
            java.lang.String overlayId,
            Bitmap bitmap,
            long startTimeMs,
            long durationMs)
        Constructor for an OverlayFrame
        Parameters:
        mediaItem - The media item owner
        overlayId - The overlay id
        bitmap - The bitmap to be used as an overlay. The size of the bitmap must equal to the size of the media item to which it is added. The bitmap is typically a decoded PNG file.
        startTimeMs - The overlay start time in milliseconds
        durationMs - The overlay duration in milliseconds
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the file type is not PNG or the startTimeMs and durationMs are incorrect.
